short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a vibrant, culturally inspired theme to your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the world of Genshin Impact every time you open a new tab with this vibrant and visually captivating browser theme. Featuring an awe-inspiring image of Xilonen, this extension brings her powerful and enigmatic presence right to your screen. Perfect for fans, the background showcases Xilonenâ€™s striking design and aesthetic, allowing you to carry a piece of Teyvat with you wherever you browse.

In addition to the stunning artwork, the extension enhances your browsing experience with practical features:
- Built-in Calculator: Quickly solve math problems without leaving the page.
- Timer: Set a timer to stay on track with your tasks.
- Multiple Search Engines: Easily switch between your preferred search engines directly from the new tab page.
- RSS news
